name: Cave's Flame
description:
In Cave's Flame you have to protect a "tresure" from the evil drops. Fight against them with the flame of your torch! But be careful: if one of the drops hits your torch (not the side with the flame), you will get hurt. Have fun and good luck!

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D to move; 
  • Move your mouse to aim with your weapon
  • Left-click to get stronger for a short period of time
  • Left-shift to move faster for a short period of time

What score did you reach?
